job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Our missionSleegalâs mission is to make legal services accessible to everyone. At Sleegal, we are using machine learning to build a legal marketplace that accurately matches clients with lawyers. Today, users have to go online to search for lawyers on their own, giving calls to multiple lawyers hoping to find the right one with the right price. With our tech, users find the lawyers that truly match their needs, with just a few lines of online chat, and completely for free.Â You will work closely with our founding team to develop our web products. We will expect you to not only solve problems but propose new ideas that may fundamentally change our product.We are a dynamic team with a mixed background in law, tech, and business. Our core team members earned degrees from top US law schools and business schools and have deep experience building successful AI products in the Valley, ranging from autonomous vehicles to wearable devices.Â This position can start immediately.
